name: Sales Notifications, Reviews, Testimonials, Polls, and Feedback Widgets by Vouchkick
author: Vouchkick

sections.description:
Did you know that 97% of your website visitors leave without buying or signing up for your email list? Most of them don’t know if they can trust you.

Vouchkick is a social proof app with 18 different widgets that help you build trust with your website visitors, so that you can get more customers, increase email signups, boost your sales, and get feedback on autopilot.

Explore all the kits here:
– Announce Anything, Anywhere on Your Site
– Show Your Popularity with Live Counter
– Recent Sales Popup
– Display Google Reviews and Social Media Content
– Collect Customer Testimonials and Feedback
– Surveys and Polls Anywhere on Your Site
– Sticky Sidebar with Custom Content
– Link In Bio Widget and Link Page
– Hot Streak of Previous Purchases
– Social Proof Smart Combo Sequence
– Coupon Popups
– Collect Emails on Any Page
– Customer Review Feed
– Cookie Notification, Discount Bar, Banner
– Display Videos Anywhere
– Rapid Feedback Widget
– Emoji Customer Satisfaction Feedback
– Social Share Widget

HOW DOES VOUCHKICK WORK?

Install it with this WordPress plugin, and sign in.

Build your kits (widgets) you want to show on your website.

Choose ‘Where’ on your website to display your kits.

Choose “When’ to trigger your kits to show.

Personalize each kit to match your brand.

Connect your kits to 1,100+ apps to automate actions, notifications, conversions, and more.
sections.installation:
1. Install Vouchkick either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate your Vouchkick account.
  3. Login using the wordpress plugin.
  4. Start creating your kits.

I downloaded the Vouchkick plugin but don’t have a Vouchkick account. Where do I get one?

You can get started for Free by signing up on our Vouchkick website.
